messages.title: Your choice on Thursday:
messages.content: The Lib Dems will clear the deficit by 2017-18, borrow less than the Tories and cut less than Labour. We will ask the richest to help fund a fairer start for young people.

messages.title: CONTROLLING OUR BORDERS
messages.content: An immigration system that works for Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £8 billion a year extra for our NHS. The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a plan to fill the NHS funding gap.
An immigration system that works for Britain - CONTROLLING OUR BORDERS
Protecting the education budget from nursery to 19

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's neck and neck - TOM BRAKE: 48%, CONSERVATIVES: 37%, Labour out of the race

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will clear the deficit by 2017-18, borrow less than the Tories and cut less than Labour.
issues.education: Protecting the education budget from nursery to 19
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for our NHS. The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a plan to fill the NHS funding gap.
issues.immigration: An immigration system that works for Britain - CONTROLLING OUR BORDERS

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m fighting to save St Helier Hospital and to improve local schools and transport.

endorsements.endorsement: Decision time for Carshalton and Wallington.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems have seriously called to question the government on the environment.
The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitments to protect the NHS budget effectively until 2017-18.
Cameron WILL have to cut NHS spending, warns senior 'Tory'.
